rooms.description: Spacious entry with a welcoming area incorporating Art Deco elements and Vastu-aligned placement of the main door.
Open-plan living space with Art Deco geometric patterns and modern fixtures. Vastu principles place it towards the north-east for prosperity.
Functional kitchen space with Art Deco style cabinetry and integrated appliances. Placed in the south-west as per Vastu to maintain balance.
Spacious bedroom featuring Art Deco detailing with a focus on natural light and tranquility. Vastu recommends placement in the west for relaxation.
Additional bedroom for joint family members with modern Art Deco touches and comfortable design. Vastu suggests an eastern orientation for growth.
Essential bathroom space designed to complement the overall aesthetic with efficient layout and Art Deco fixtures. Vastu guidelines suggest placing it in the south.
Dedicated home theater area with soundproofing and comfortable seating arrangements. Designed to be a focal entertainment zone within the studio apartment.
Expansive garden area integrated into the design with landscaping and natural elements. Vastu encourages aligning garden space to the east for positive energy.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with Vastu principles facing east for auspicious entry.
Large windows offering natural light and ventilation, placed per Vastu guidelines in the north-eastern direction.
